Description: The publication date extracted from PubMed database
A sub-level attribute of `program` specifying a research initiative working to investigate particular hypotheses.
Valid Values: AIM for RA, ELLIPSS, LOCKIT, RA, SLE, STAMP, V-CoRT

Description: A high-level attribute for grouping attributes into templates.
Journal in which the publication was released
Name of the funding program that supported the generation of data and associated files
Valid Values: AMP AIM, AMP RA/SLE, Community Contribution

Description: The synID of a Dataset entity. This serves to link other Synapse entities to Dataset entities. When used to annotate a publication Dataset this attribute should include the synID for an experimental Datasets from which the publication data was derived. Multiple synID can be specified using a comma-delimited list.
Year (YYYY) in which the paper was published.
Pubmed Central Identifier, formatted as a compact URI string that will automatically resolve into a URL based on the Synapse bioregistry; e.g., pmc:PMCxxxxxxxx
A label noting which AMP RA/SLE program phase generated the data.
